body_html: Interestingly, the members are plain pointers already, it's just the sizes/strides functions that return IntLists (and so probably won't work on the device, I'd not be too concerned) and the size(i)/stride(i) that is changed now changed not to construct an IntList just to access a single item...

body: Interestingly, the members are plain pointers already, it's just the sizes/strides functions that return IntLists (and so probably won't work on the device, I'd not be too concerned) and the size(i)/stride(i) that is changed now changed not to construct an IntList just to access a single item...
